OOC: You misread my post, obviously.  By the time Devilcat and Riekan 
get to the command center, Torin has dumped Jayde in the CR already.  
This is not some backwoods group - the Rogues are as well-equipped as 
any of the forces here, better in some cases.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Noir --
> 
> Noir stops leaning against the wall as Devilcat enters. Her lith 
> form straightens, and she salutes the Rogue leader. Her eyes slip 
> off Devilcat to Riekan and Torin, nodding in acknoledgement of 
their 
> presence, then they return to Devilcat.
> 
> "Welcome back Devilcat, long time no see." She checks out Jayde, 
> then smirks, "Well done Jayde." Her gaze shifts back to Devilcat.
> 
> "Yah, Gatara filled me in on what happened... at least I seem to 
> have recovered, although it seems I have a little bit of my memory 
> missing, perhaps the shock..." Trailing off, she diverts her eyes, 
> and stares at the nearest computer console, as if struggling to 
> remember something important, then giving up.
> 
> Recovering herself, she keeps going before anyone can say 
> anything, "Well Devilcat, I'm fully prepared to start doing 
missions 
> for you as soon as possible. Maybe I should do some repairs of 
Jayde 
> first though..."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Devilcat, Riekan, and Torin (who is still carrying Jayde) finally 
> > reach their destination.  Entering the base, they split up.  
Torin 
> > takes his charge to the medical bay and puts her in the CR 
> chamber.  
> > The other two head to the control room, where they find Gatara 
and 
> > Noir.
> > 
> > "Ah, Noir, good to see you up," Devilcat says, spreading his 
hands.
